Title: Binding from Book on Navigation
Medium: boards covered with red leather with gilt
Description: This later binding from Walters manuscript W.658 is composed of larger size boards and has a flap. The binding  has a central panel and side panels richly decorated and brushed over with gilt, doublures of red leather with a central lobed oval, and corner pieces in the shape of a dentelle, with filigree work.
Keywords: Art; Binding; Codex; Colophon; Headpiece; History; Illumination; Illustration; Islamic; Manuscript; Ornament; Painting; Turkish; Cartography; Geography
Provenance: Henry Walters, Baltimore [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Creator: Islamic
